short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add useful developer features to the BlueSky AppView, like context menu buttons to copy a user's DID

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds developer and power-user features, like buttons to copy a user's DID (Decentralized Identifier) from context menus on their profile or posts.
